description:
Cinema Eau de Parfum - A Glamorous Fragrance Experience

Step into the spotlight with Yves Saint Laurent Cinema EDP, a captivating 90ml fragrance that transforms everyday moments into extraordinary experiences. This luxurious women's perfume captures the essence of Hollywood glamour and feminine elegance in every spritz. âœ¨

The Allure of Cinema Perfume

Created by the legendary fashion house Yves Saint Laurent, Cinema EDP is a sophisticated oriental floral composition that embodies the magic and allure of the silver screen. Like a beautiful actress stepping onto the red carpet, this fragrance commands attention and leaves a memorable impression. ðŸŒŸ

Product Information
Size 90ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration EDP
Brand Yves Saint Laurent

The Symphony of Cinema Fragrance Notes

Fragrance Pyramid
Top Notes Clementine, Almond Blossom, Cyclamen
Heart Notes Jasmine, Peony, Amaryllis
Base Notes Amber, Vanilla, White Musk, Benzoin

Key Features of YSL Cinema

  • ðŸŒ¸ Opulent floral bouquet centered around jasmine and amaryllis
  • ðŸ’Ž Rich amber and vanilla base for long-lasting warmth
  • âœ¨ Elegant bottle design inspired by classic Hollywood glamour
  • ðŸ”¥ Impressive longevity and moderate sillage
  • ðŸ’« Perfect for evening wear and special occasions

Launched in 2004 and created by master perfumer Jacques Cavallier, YSL Cinema was inspired by the golden age of Hollywood. The distinctive amber-colored juice is housed in an art deco-inspired bottle that resembles a glamorous award statuette, making it a stunning addition to any perfume collection.

The Cinema fragrance experience begins with bright, fresh clementine and delicate almond blossom, evolving into a heart of lush florals. The base notes of amber, vanilla, and benzoin create a warm, enveloping sensation that lingers beautifully on the skin for hours. This premium fragrance is perfect for the confident woman who isn't afraid to be the star of her own story. ðŸŒ¿

Frequently Asked Question

How long does YSL Cinema EDP last on skin?
YSL Cinema EDP offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 7-9 hours on most skin types. The rich amber and vanilla base notes create a warm, enveloping scent that evolves beautifully throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and moisturized skin. Many users report that the fragrance develops a beautiful depth after the first hour of wear.
short_description: Experience the glamour of Yves Saint Laurent Cinema EDP, a captivating oriental floral fragrance. This 90ml women's perfume blends sparkling clementine, lush jasmine, and rich amber-vanilla base notes to create a show-stopping scent that transforms everyday moments into star-worthy occasions.
